sentences.en: He truncated a news item to fit the available space.
sentences.cn: 他删节一则新闻以适合可用的版面.

sentences.en: Line | 1 : Class name too long; truncated to | 2.
sentences.cn: 行| 1: 类名过长; 已将其截断为|2.

sentences.en: Line | 1 : Control name too long; truncated to | 2.
sentences.cn: 行| 1: 控件名过长; 已将其截断为|2.

sentences.en: My article was published in truncated form.
sentences.cn: 我的文章以节录的形式发表了。

sentences.en: NMAKE truncated the name to an eight - character base and a three - character extension.
sentences.cn: NMAKE将 该名称截断为八个字符的基名和三个字符的扩展名.

sentences.en: Note: Any data beyond the new EOS will be truncated and lost.
sentences.cn: 注意: 任何超出新设置的文件末尾[EOS]的数据都将被删除或丢失.

sentences.en: Oligocene erosion had truncated the sediments draped over the dome.
sentences.cn: 覆盖于穹丘上的沉积岩为渐新世侵蚀所截削.

sentences.en: Sederholm regarded the Svecofennide belt as an older structure truncated by a younger Varelide belt.
sentences.cn: 塞德霍尔姆认为斯维科芬褶皱带本身为一老的构造,被比较年轻的卡累利褶皱带所截断.

sentences.en: The correctness of the program, however, is unaffected by the truncated name.
sentences.cn: 但是, 程序的正确性不受截断名称的影响.

sentences.en: The Project name is too long. Name has been truncated.
sentences.cn: 工程名太长. 因此名称已被截断.

sentences.en: The review body has produced a truncated version of its annual report.
sentences.cn: 该评论机构出版了其年报的删节版本。

sentences.en: The saved Host Name was too long and it has been truncated.
sentences.cn: 保存的主机名太长,已经被截断.

sentences.en: The slices are truncated by the pre - Bulawayan erosion surface.
sentences.cn: 岩片受前布拉瓦约侵蚀面切割.

sentences.en: The truncated nozzle is found to have a higher thrust.
sentences.cn: 截断的喷管具有较大的推力.

sentences.en: With XML, the white space in your document is not truncated.
sentences.cn: 在XML文档中,空白部分不会被解析器自动删除.

words.tran_cn: 缩短（truncate的过去分词）；截去…的顶端

trans.tran_cn: 切去顶端的，缩短了的，被删节的
trans.tran_en: A truncated version of something is one that has been shortened

trans.tran_cn: 截面的( truncate的过去式和过去分词 )，截头的，缩短了的，截去顶端或末端
